nodes.text: Starwarsholidayspecial.com, also known as The Star Wars Holiday Special and Star Wars Holiday Special, is a fan website created by Skot Kirkwood dedicated to 1978's The Star Wars Holiday Special. The website features rare behind-the-scenes photographs, cast interviews, concept art, and various other multimedia. Following the Holiday Special's only airing, Kirkwood spent decades collecting relevant merchandise and information prior to launching the site. In 2008, he was interviewed, and his site profiled, on StarWars.com for the special's thirtieth anniversary.
